tool_description: This is an API that shows the latest cryptocurrency news.
title: Crypto News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual Crypto News Source
api_list.description: Gets news about cryptocurrencies from a specific news source. Currently www.cryptonews.com, www.cryptonews.net and www.coindesk.com are supported.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newssourceid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cryptocurrency News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the latest news about all the various cryptocurrencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-news-live3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
